body: Hello fellow Avicus members. If i haven't already met you or you never really got to know me, I'm back from a long break. It's been a good break but I've decided to come back and hope to see some familiar faces My IGN is connor4961. Glad to be back, see ya around guys!
body_tagged: Hello fellow Avicus members. If i haven't already met you or you never really got to know me, I'm back from a long break. It's been a good break but I've decided to come back and hope to see some familiar faces My IGN is connor4961. Glad to be back, see ya around guys!
title: Hey guys! I'm back!

replies.body: Ps: You may know me as SawViper/SandViper.

Hey! You played Elimination alot didnt you?

Im MarkColtsFan, i almost prestiged in Elimination, then the avicore update happened and Elim died, rip </3

replies.body: Long time no see :) We were Junior Mods together! I was promoted in the batch after ours, and was mod for six months, but I just got demoted a couple weeks ago :P

replies.body:
Hey, Connor! I was one of the NuclearDucky people you played with. :P 

Me and my sister use to play on it, but I got my own account, and she doesn't really play anymore. :( 

Nice to see you back, though! <3
